data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Tieling, Liaoning, China that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Tieling, Liaoning, China
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Tieling, Liaoning, China to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Tieling, Liaoning, China need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the county of Tieling.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Xibe, Western people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Tieling, Liaoning, China.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the county of Tieling who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 14,005,472 lost people in  Tieling, Liaoning, China have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.
